Reviews.Title: It's junk.
Reviews.Author: Tam
Reviews.Content: I read the good reviews for this product but not enough of the bad reviews. Bought this TV because of the price and decent reviews. Beware!!!!! TV was okay until I turned it on this morning and there was sound but no picture. THEN I researched the bad reviews! (Duh.)Lots and lots of reviews mention just this problem -- sound but no picture. AND there was not one mention of good Sceptre customer service!! Evidently I am SOL. Will do my best to deal with this but won't be buying a Sceptre TV again.

Reviews.Title: Buyer Beware On This!!
Reviews.Author: Vickie Huey
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV from Amazon a little over a month ago.  Due to problems with our satellite dish company, it took us that long to finally get everything hooked up.  As soon as we did, we discovered 1) the remote control did not work and 2) there were horizontal black lines across the screen.  I called technical support 4 times and heard nothing back.  I then emailed them and still heard nothing back.  I finally called their customer support line and surprise of all surprises, I actually got to talk to a person!  I explained what was going on so she put me on hold to go talk to technical support.  20 minutes later she came back on the line and said that no one was available in technical support but that it sounded like TV was defective (really?!).  She said that since I was out of the Amazon warranty period, my only option was to go online and complete some online forms then ship the TV back to California (I live in Ohio).  If they were able to fix the problem, I would get the TV back in approximately 3 weeks, if not, they would replace the TV.  What a nightmare!  Fortunately Amazon was willing to take all this into consideration and let me return the TV to them even though I was outside the 30 day warranty (barely).  Shame on Sceptre 1) for selling inferior products and 2) for having such incredibly poor customer/technical support.  Kudos to Amazon for being so understanding and being willing to work with me.

Reviews.Title: Sceptre 32" TV
Reviews.Author: Kennysawn
Reviews.Content: Can't complain at all.  Arrived fast and picture looks perfect in my bedroom. Only complaint I have is the audio level is not as strong as I would prefer.

Reviews.Title: great tv at great price
Reviews.Author: Ranger 797
Reviews.Content: this is a great tv for a great price, picture quality is very good has lots of inputs 3 HDMI , I have a hd dvr on HDmi-1,a upscaling dvd/vhs recorder on HDMI-2 and a playstation 3 on HDMI-3 and all look great sound is ok but not great that is my only con. check

Reviews.Title: I cannot believe it!
Reviews.Author: Nigel
Reviews.Content: I purchased a new Sceptre TV, but there is a big problem with it. I plugged in the TV cable and PS3, but the TV is not responding. Besides the turn on or off button, any other button is not working or responding. After I follow the user manual to plug in the cable and PS3, I press the SOURCE button, but there is no responding. I just bought this new one, but when I opened it and tried it, this problem appeared. And I contacted the tech-support and customer service, they never brought me to a human and did not reply my email. Terrible!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: 3 years with no problem
Reviews.Author: W. davis
Reviews.Content: It is August 2011 and I have had the Sceptre for 3 years now. When I bought it, it was a little higher in price ($399) but a great deal for those days. I have never had a single problem with the unit. The picture is great and it has a lot of hookups. I have one hdmi hooked to my dvd/vcr player. I have one hdmi hooked to my xbox. I have my ps2 hooked into one of the red yellow white. It has a couple. It's a great setup for the price. This is one deal I always look back at as a good one. I would recommend it. I would buy another one. You also get a high quality screw driver with it (just saying). Just look at the unit specs and make sure it has the hookups you want.

Reviews.Title: Horrible TV
Reviews.Author: robot
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my stepson less than 3 months ago. All he used it for was playing games on his PS3. It got about 1 or 2 hours use on weekdays and maybe 6 to 8 hours on weekends. From one day to the next the display went out. Just a black screen and sound. The worst part is Spectre customer service. I've called multiple times in the past two weeks and have not been able to get through to a human. The automated answering service always reroutes me to voice mail after about 2 minutes of waiting for technical support or customer service. I've left numerous messages and no one has called me back. I also opened a return case on Spectre's website but have yet to receive a RMA. I'm very disappointed with the quality of the TV but I'm even more disappointed with the lack of customer service.

Reviews.Title: Audio does not work!
Reviews.Author: Nancy "Nancy"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this online and had to return it because the TVs audio stopped working until you changed the channel. Also it made a loud buzzing. Noise. I returned it and Amazon gave me a full refund.I love to shop with Amazon and thay have never been a problem so it's probably just a bad connection in the one I purchased.

Reviews.Title: Good product, good price
Reviews.Author: Becky Cervenka
Reviews.Content: For an off brand, I'm quite surprised.  It has a beautiful picture. There has been no problems to date. I'm quite satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Will not turn on..
Reviews.Author: Dennis
Reviews.Content: When I turn the on, the Logo appears for a few seconds, then disappears.. Tha'ts it.. When I try to access the menu or source buttons, nothing happens.. I tried using the buttons on the side of the TV, thinking maybe the remote it bad, but same results.. I am trying to contact customer support but I think they are closed for the holidays.. Anyone else have the same issues with the TV?

Reviews.Title: not a very good tv
Reviews.Author: Bret Fink
Reviews.Content: When using this tv as a monitor it leaves a ghost of the screen you had open on the tv very anoying.

Reviews.Title: Horrible mistake
Reviews.Author: Samantha Turpin
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these tv's about 8 months ago and my mothers decided today was the day to give up the ghost no warning no nothing it just crapped out we try to turn it on and the blue light comes on but the tv remains dark no sound no nothing pushing the power on off button has no effect the blue light stays illuminated but it's like it's frozen or some crap I doubt there's anything to be done about it but we will never purchase sceptre products again it seems like an awesome bargain at first but it really isn't this cheap set was obviously not built to last for any length of time and I doubt that anyone from sceptre inc. that reads this will do anything from the horror stories I've read they're lacking in the customer service department

Reviews.Title: Not durable
Reviews.Author: kakaroto "Goku"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the tv 8 months ago and have been using it only about 1 hour per day.Yesterdy this TV stopped displaying pictures while the sound is working.This is NOT a durable product.

Reviews.Title: Confused about bad reviews, I bought 3 and they are all great!
Reviews.Author: sarmomemt "sarmomemt"
Reviews.Content: I bought 3 of these televisions from a major chain retail store during a move to a new home. I bought two for bedrooms & one for my family room. I am confused about the reviews here not only since the TV's are perfectly fine for me but also because they were rated 5 stars at the big blue store with the smiley face logo where I bought it from.Pros:--------- very clear picture using an amazon basics hdmi cable to connect to the cable box- sound quality is even & good.- the picture quality is comparable to my 46" Panasonic plasma tv that was a best buy & very well reviewed by cnet when I bought it.- the tv stand swivels left to right allowing u to view at just the right angle & avoid any sun glare coming in through the windows. Usually at this price point u have to buy this kind of stand separately.- good tv for a good price!.Cons:---------- remote control: the buttons are very close together & seem very awkwardly laid out. It feels very cheap- the cable inputs on the back of the TV are well labeled but very hard to use as they run vertically & u have to insert them blind basically. You have to slide the cables up vertically from the back bottom of the tv to the back center of the tv.

Reviews.Title: Goes Dark Within a Year
Reviews.Author: Clyde
Reviews.Content: I bought 7 of these for our motel.  I now have three that have gone dark.  I give it 2 stars and not just one because sending them in for service is pretty easy when you request it online.  Within 48 hours I get an email with a label to print and if I need one, a box is sent to me to ship it back in (now I just keep one around).  Within 2 weeks I get the TV back.  But I will not buy any more of these because if they are just replacing the part with another one that will go out within a year (at motel usage which is a lot less than home usage) forget it.

Reviews.Title: good hdtv i like it
Reviews.Author: James Gordon
Reviews.Content: i bought this hdtv one week before black friday sales, i got a good deal on amazon i received my tv hook it up and it has a good picture, it has 3 hdmi connectins 1 rca connection and 1 component connection i like this and have no complaints. if you are thinking about a hdtv this is a good deal, good picture quality and lots of connections i might get another in the future.GOOD PRODUCT.

Reviews.Title: Living Proof
Reviews.Author: RALLEN
Reviews.Content: This TV is living proof that most LCD's are made the same.  Some people insist on well-known, name-brand TV's only, fearing they're going to get some sub-standard piece of junk.  I read an article not log ago that the parts for all of these TV's pretty much come from the same manufacturer's with a few exceptions.  As time went by, I slowly replaced our older Sony's with these lesser-known brands and they work perfectly.  Own 6 of these similar LCD's now and never had a problem.  Shop by the price and you won't be let down.

Reviews.Title: background noise resolved, still just OK
Reviews.Author: A. Alcala "Mexglx"
Reviews.Content: I've had it hooked up for a week. I have been noticing when you turn up the volume there is background noise. Its annoying. Picture is fine. Connections in the back are pretty flimsy. When connecting the component video and audio cables the jacks are flimsy and move quite a bit. The remote control has a very flimsy feel. Will check tech support and return if it doesn't get resolved.Update- I called tech support at Sceptre and they suggested I try different cables from the AT&T; U-verse receiver . I originally had component video and audio wires. I switched to an HDMI  cable and the noise went away.  Whatever the root cause was its resolved now. So overall  the TV is doing fine now that i changed the connection to the U-verse receiverUpdate- About 8 months old and still working fine. I only upped my star rating one star because even though the sound is background noise is resolved its becuase of a workaround and not a solution to the problem. Using the HDMI ports instead of the Component jacks isn't a fix. If a TV is going to have Component inputs they should work. These doen't without noise. The fact that the HDMI inputs worked is not a plus, its table stakes. They are supposed to work. So I upped my rating to 3 stars becuase of the valid comments I saw to my post. But the TV remains only OK. Picture is OK, pixilates a lot on sports or concert type images. It was challenging to find a code that worked using AT&Ts; uverse remote to control the TV. The autosearch function for the code worked the best.

Reviews.Title: Read the Reviews!
Reviews.Author: Sherry Studdard
Reviews.Content: I bought the TV in April 2012. It has been a great TV. Then the picture went out. Of course, I always buy the extended warranties on my electronics. Since my problem, I went back and saw where alot of people had the same issue I did. For the price, I got my money's worth. The extended warranty was only an extra 24.00 and I had it back within a week. For the money, it's a good deal.

Reviews.Title: Terrible Sound problems
Reviews.Author: Grace
Reviews.Content: We received this TV as a gift and have had terrible problems with the volume.  We can hardly hear it even though it is up to the highest level.  When we spoke with a Sceptre technician, he advised that we need to purchase a speaker to increase the volume and noted that the price range is from $40-$400 if purchased thru Sceptre.  This is a very POOR product and the company needs to take responsibility for it's shortcomings but won't.  Had I purchased a new TV, I would have spent my money on a reputable product that would NOT have required additional parts to perform at a normal level.  If considering purchasing a new tv, do not purchase a Sceptre TV!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Had it replaced under warranty thanks to Better Business Bureau
Reviews.Author: the_philosopher
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV through walmart.com, and the picture went black on it after only a few months. This is apparently a common problem with these TV's. I tried to contact customer service several times to no avail. I then filed a BBB complaint and immediately a Sceptre customer service representative contacted me and was very helpful. They sent me a shipping box and a prepaid shipping level to return the TV to them (all at no cost to me). Surprisingly, they sent me a brand new replacement TV instead of repairing the one they sent me. In the end, I was pleased with the outcome, but you may have to resort to the BBB to get good service like I did. I've had the replacement TV for 4 months now with no problems.The complaints about the tinny speakers on this TV are exactly right. They're terrible. However, I was able to connect a pair of spare USB-powered speakers using the tv's usb port and headphone port and am VERY happy with this setup. The speakers come on automatically when the TV is turned on and go off when the tv is turned off, and the volume control on the remote DOES control the volume of the speakers. The TV actually comes with a 7-band EQ (an unexpected feature on a cheap tv) that allows me to get those speakers sounding just the way I want them.All in all, if you can get this TV bundled with an extended replacement plan for cheap, I say go ahead and buy it. It has a great picture, all necessary inputs, and can have excellent sound with convenient USB-powered speakers. Just be prepared for a hassle if it breaks during the manufacturer warranty period.

Reviews.Title: Good cheap TV
Reviews.Author: Nate Sutton "farmall_fixer"
Reviews.Content: I buy these for use at trade shows. Its a cheap tv and if it gets stolen or broken who cares? So far the three I have purchased have held up great with all the traveling they have done.  The picture is only average and so is the sound good enough for what I use them for.  If you are going to watch a lot of blueray DVDs you might want to look for a higher end tv.

Reviews.Title: So Much Bang for the buck!
Reviews.Author: snndn
Reviews.Content: So I'm seeing a lot of reviews from people who think this TV should perform like a $1000 unit.  "I can't find a color setting that I like?"  - please.  Go buy a high-end TV if that's what you want and quit griping about your $200 flat screen.Here's the real-deal:  TV came well packaged and in good condition.  I actually hooked it up within a few days - instead of leaving it in the yard for a month like some of the other reviewers - it works fine.  Picture looks good and all of the features (including the remote) work with zero issues.The audio situation (speakers):  some reviewers act like this thing should give you stereo-quality sound, it doesn't.  Don't expect it.  I have a home audio system that I use when I want good sound.  If you put this TV in a large room - you're going to need  supplemental sound.  Here's my gripe about the speakers:  there is no really "low" volume setting.  Nit-picky I know, but the space between "mute" and "1" is a little broad.  So, 4 out of 5.  If you need a cheap TV - this one works well.

Reviews.Title: not a good brand
Reviews.Author: Juan
Reviews.Content: for the price is ok but the tv is not a good brand some pixels are damage u can see the black spots on the screen but like I said for the price is ok

Reviews.Title: Great price and quality
Reviews.Author: Cheryl K
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV and an unbeatable price I purchased the Square Trade warranty to give me additional coverage in case I need service

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: CountryGirl
Reviews.Content: My husband & I got this tv for our bedroom and its great! Bright picture, great sound, it's an awesome tv for the price! Very happy!

Reviews.Title: Dead pixel
Reviews.Author: Sam E. Everhart Jr.
Reviews.Content: One dead pixel in the middle of the screen! Not worth returning because it was so cheap. Other than that it makes a good bedroom TV.

Reviews.Title: pleased
Reviews.Author: jtiell
Reviews.Content: I have only had this tv for a few weeks and have not had any problems for 189.00 new. and free shipping i am very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great Price - Makes a Great Monitor
Reviews.Author: Gordon Bordon
Reviews.Content: I use this strictly as a monitor in my study. I sit in my recliner 6 feet away from the monitor and use my wireless mouse and keyboard and bluetooth headphones and I'm perfectly comfortable and have no problems with seeing the screen when watching movies or surfing the web or working on documents. Colors are great, clarity is fine, the ports on the back are easy to get to. But - If you have a cabinet you're putting it in, the buttons on the monitor are on the side so you need to always use the remote (which means you always need to be able to find it!) or have a 40+ inch opening so you have room to get to the buttons. I don't use the speakers so I can't tell you anything about them but if you're looking for an inexpensive 32" monitor and it's going to sit on top of a desk or table, this is absolutely perfect.

Reviews.Title: Low Price. Lower Quality.
Reviews.Author: J. Cristobal
Reviews.Content: PROS:-It's super cheap for a 32-inch-It works (at least mine does)-HDMI! (just like every other flat screen...)-USB! (at least as many ports as every other flat screen)CONS:-Terrible, TERRIBLE audio. If this is the only 'con' that makes you skeptical, then just invest in a sound system (even a cheap crappy set of speakers should be an improvement). What I found is that the volume control only seems to work at super low volumes. I think its on a scale of 1-100 and basically, once you hit 35 or 40, the sound of the speakers crapping all over themselves makes it impossible to hear any of the highs or lows that it's trying to put out. So basically any (actor's) voice that varies in either direction (up or down) from absolutely calm and practically monotone will cause the TV to start crapping so loudly all over itself that you can't stand to watch.-Screen Resolution. Ok I've tried and tried to find some sort of setting to fix this, and I'll admit I'm no expert on the difference between digital and analog TV channels, but for me, the only channels displayed in full resolution are ones that I happen to get the "digital" version of. To watch any "analog" channel in "standard" resolution leaves 2-3 inches of black, unused space on all four sides of the screen. The picture isn't a square (like I'd of thought analog would make it), its just like resizing your browser window to exactly 3/4 of its size (when maximized), and then carefully centering it on your screen. Annoying as s***, right? The only way to get a full screen of picture is by selecting either the "zoom" or stretch settings, which will either result in cutting off a few inches from every side or making all of your favorite celebrities super short and fat. Perhaps I am just way behind the times with my cable service and need to upgrade or something. I dunno. But it's really annoying because apparently every channel I ever watch is like this.-Color. This isn't as unbearable as the last two complaints, but I cannot freaking find some decent color options that work for everything. Like, I finally adjust every setting for contrast, tint, brightness and everything so that it looks acceptable for an Xbox game, but then put in a movie and you can't see a thing. And while I'm here, don't even think about buying this if Xbox (or probably any game console) is going to be a primary use for it. I've tried every combination of picture settings but this TV doesn't even try to do justice to their graphics. I bought Borderlands 2 as soon as it came out and played it for weeks on a similar LCD, and the picture quality was mind blowing!! Then I brought it home and the game looked like it was made 10 years ago. But hey, at least I get a full resolution picture when I'm gaming, right?-I guess those are my only complaints really. Sound and Video. The only two things a TV was made to do.

Reviews.Title: Hooked it up and had no picture within 15 minutes
Reviews.Author: Michael Chapman
Reviews.Content: Bought it on Black Friday, finally took delivery of it from Walmart yesterday.  Hooked it up, and had it running for 15 whole minutes before the screen just went out.  It came back but only barely visible long enough for me to check the settings, I was thinking it might be a power saver mode or something.  Nope, it's just garbage.  I know you get what you pay for, but come on!  And trying to get someone on the customer service line is ridiculous.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Mark Pujia
Reviews.Content: I only gave 1 star because 0 stars was not an option. I bought 2 of these TVs as Christmas presents. 1 had a cluster of burnt out pixels and the other had a faulty picture. I will never ever buy another Sceptre product again!!!

Reviews.Title: $200 Wall Decoration,  Save Your Money.
Reviews.Author: JMS
Reviews.Content: Don't waste your money. Purchased this television for our daughter's bedroom and just days after the warranty period expired  the tv started making a strange whining sound when powering on.  Within a couple days there was no picture, just sound, the next day nothing at all.  It's a $200 wall decoration.  I was pleased with this purchase initially, but I expected it to work longer than one year.  One star.

Reviews.Title: Picture Good When TV works!
Reviews.Author: sherri doby
Reviews.Content: I bought the TV December 13,2012. The picture went on on the tv in October 2013. TV would come on but no picture. I have already sent the TV back in October 2013 to have it repaired.  It took about a  month to repair it, and i have had it back for 1 1/2 months and the picture is already out again.  Amazon needs to rethink selling something like this that has such bad quality.

Reviews.Title: sceptre tv
Reviews.Author: Denise Hegeman
Reviews.Content: it is a great tv for the money. sound is alittle low but it has a great picture. great deal.

Reviews.Title: Horrible TV!  Stay Away!
Reviews.Author: T.D.W. "Mr. Grinch"
Reviews.Content: Bought it Dec 6, 2012 [on-line from Wal-Mart].  In Feb 2013 the on-screen display began to malfunction.  It pretty much worked when it pleased.  Then on Apr 1, 2013 it turned itself off and wouldn't restart.Contacted customer support by phone [I prefer to yell at a human rather than play e-mail tag].  They readily gave me the steps needed to return the TV for repair.  However, they took their sweet time processing my request and giving me my return shipping permit.  I nagged them daily for a week until they gave it to me.Once sent, they returned it to me on Apr 24, 2013.  "Fixed".  Hah!  It shut off again July 24 2013, exactly three months later.  Here we go again.In my entire life [5 decades plus] I have NEVER had a TV quit working.  They all worked until replaced by newer models.This Sceptre has crapped out TWICE in 7 months?!?  It's a piece of junk!!  Save your money.  Spare yourself grief.  Buy something better.

Reviews.Title: I HATE THIS T V/
Reviews.Author: joe taylor
Reviews.Content: I Purchase this TV 7 months ago it just stop working , now am trying to have it fix .

Reviews.Title: not happy
Reviews.Author: Erica
Reviews.Content: i purchased the tv in november. It was working fine, till today when the tv stopped working. I was about to reccomend this brand untill it stopped working.

Reviews.Title: Great TV fir the price
Reviews.Author: Steedee
Reviews.Content: This arrived fast. TV is mounted on a corner wall. Great picture and features for the price.Probably will buy another in the future. If your looking for an inexpensive good flat screen. This is it.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Ashli Davis
Reviews.Content: This TV is a great deal for that price! The picture is clear and it is all you need in a TV.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Carly
Reviews.Content: The Tv was exactly what they advertised & exactly what I expected!Works great!Thanks!I bought it for my daughter & she loves it!

Reviews.Title: old television died
Reviews.Author: Tess Blount
Reviews.Content: Had to have a new one and didn't want to spend any money, it was cheap and seems to do the trick

Reviews.Title: 2 of the 3 TV's I purchased stopped working at 9 months
Reviews.Author: Michael French
Reviews.Content: Tried to claim the 1 year warranty through Sceptre's website, filled out the form, and got an automated email that they would send a claim number and return boxes within 48 hours. Four days later I still had not heard anything so I emailed them. A couple days later still no response so I filed a claim through the BBB. About a week later I finally received return boxes, but no other information and no return labels so I had to pay for shipping. Still have not received the repaired/replaced TV's and I am not holding my breath. Just an awful company with awful products.

Reviews.Title: Sceptre
Reviews.Author: Gail Angel
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv! We had to return it because of a smudge appearing on the screen. It was a very easy process, and am very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Secptre 32" TV
Reviews.Author: Larry A. Sample
Reviews.Content: Excellent TV for the price.  Great picture and has been lasting a long time now as I'm late giving this review.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: Odie
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV on Cyber Monday as a gift for my parents who were still using a TV from the 90's in their bedroom. This TV is great and I would highly recommend it for anyone on a budget. The picture is clear and we have had no issues with the audio as some reviewers have stated.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: melissa bullard
Reviews.Content: my boyfriend is loving his TV, it was his birthday gift, he so love it thanks again. i rate five stars because, he wanted a TV long time and now he has one to watch.

Reviews.Title: Great, inexpensive tv
Reviews.Author: jesse
Reviews.Content: I will start off by saying that I only watch TV about two hours a week so I was not looking to spend a fortune on the fanciest coolest best TV out there. I am sure there are TVs available with a clearer picture and better sound but not for this price. The colors on this TV are good. And the picture is bright enough to watch in a sunny room. If I had to come up with one complaint about this TV it would be the sound. It always sounds like it is coming from farther away than the picture. It isn't terrible and doesn't really take away from the TV but that could be improved I think. There are plenty of connections on the TV to hook up game systems or DVD players. Overall this is a nice TV and I would purchase another if the need ever came up.

Reviews.Title: flat screen tv
Reviews.Author: warren
Reviews.Content: was a gift,so i'm sure they gave it a 5 star rating also,i would use these ppl again to order

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the price
Reviews.Author: ANTHONY H
Reviews.Content: Bought for my parents-in-law as a gift!  They are very happy with the TV.  Would recommend to friends and family

Reviews.Title: Fast Delievery
Reviews.Author: Yoav Sabah
Reviews.Content: let's say it worth the money i paid for.the sound of the speakers is not that great but i plugged my entertainment system.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Tara Samons
Reviews.Content: I have had 2 of these TVs for 3 months and they work great.  It has a nice picture and is compatible with coaxial too.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: scott
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this tv , and the price. it arrived on time and all in tact .

Reviews.Title: Good TV for very good price
Reviews.Author: Walking with a Smile
Reviews.Content: I really like this TV, especially the size for the room we got it to go in.  Good picture and works well with gaming systems.

Reviews.Title: Great TV For the Price!!
Reviews.Author: Clarence E. Whitfield "Cj"
Reviews.Content: I bought one back in November have nothing but good things to say. Nice clear, functional, displays HD what more can you ask for for under $200?  Nothing. 5 stars. No complaints. I use it a computer moniter I watch a lot of net flix and stream HD NBA.  Great Buy. Im purchasing my second one today after the intial one went great the first 3 months hence the reveiw.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Robbie Mundy
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV for my guest room to replace an old standard crt TV that had a terrible picture and weighed a ton! The picture is very good but I can't speak as to reliability as I have not had it very long. But for the price and picture very good.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Eduin Garcia
Reviews.Content: An good lcd tv, good quality and very preety very good image  good good good good good good good good good good

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Carol Farrell
Reviews.Content: This tv is for our bedroom and iit fits just perfectly where I wanted it.I would recommend this to anyone.  Great value for the price.  Exactly what I expected.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Thomas Williams
Reviews.Content: I bought 4 of these for the bedrooms in our house.  It is a great television!  the picture quality is better than I expected it to be.  The sound is exactly how I expected it to be.  The sound quality is not good, but if you plug it into a receiver everything is great.

Reviews.Title: Great Value!
Reviews.Author: elv5034
Reviews.Content: This TV has great picture quality and features for the price. I didn't buy this expecting the quality to be as good as my LG TV. I had reasonable expectations and I was still surprised. The quality is better than I thought it would be and you can't beat the price of $180. I haven't had any problems with the stand, as others have mentioned. It was very easy to set up and only took about five minutes to do so. I'm very happy with this purchase and so is the person I bought it for.

Reviews.Title: No Volume Instantly!!!!
Reviews.Author: Andrew & Claire
Reviews.Content: This TV is my sons since December.  It is April and the volume has already stopped working entirely!!! Do not buy a Sceptre Product.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value
Reviews.Author: IPPete "IPPete"
Reviews.Content: I had low expectations but it has really great performance for the price paid.  Keep in mind this is not a 1080 machine so picture side by side with a 1080 box may not be as good, but given the screen size it does matter that much.  Using it as a TV in the dining room that can be seen from kitchen and for this works very well.  Sound is not Hi-Fi by any stretch but is decent enough.  So far no problems with the TV at all, worked fine out of the box.  If it lasts 3 to 5 years I will be very happy and feel I got my money's worth.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, less than great sound
Reviews.Author: Julian Mitchell
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son to watch after homework and over the weekend and the picture is great, love the look and size of it. It has a long Sceptre slashscreen when you power up but we can live with that. Sound quality does leave quite a bit to desire. Since its in my kids room it will work out fine but if this was for the master bedroom or mine alone I'd have to find something with a little better audio quality. Other than that its great for the price and you truly will love the colors that are displayed.side note, I thought I purchased it from Frugal Buys but when it arrived at my door the packing and shipping slip read it was from Wal-Mart, this got me upset because I dont shop from there...Period!!! Good Product just be sure who you are getting it from.

Reviews.Title: should be a zero rating
Reviews.Author: Andrea
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV in July 2012 it is now Dec. My attitude was that for the price if it only lasted two years I would be ok with that. I absolutely loved it until 4 months later, in Nov. 2012, when the picture went out. Dealing with customer service was difficult. It took all day to get a hold of someone. I suspect they have one person answering the phones. They mailed me a box to send the TV back for repairs that took over a week. I Mailed it back...4 more days.From the time I contacted customer service from the time I got my TV back was just short of a month by two days. I wasn't upset at all because I thought I would be getting a TV that would now not have any problems. I was wrong. As soon as I hooked up the TV there was a NEW PROBLEM...6 yellow dots on the screen. It is extremely noticeable especially on a black screen when the TV is just turning on and you see the Sceptre logo. They obviously didn't not test the TV before sending it back! Now I am trying to contact customer service again!I would love to support an American made product and American employees. I knew for the price I was taking a chance, but this is RIDICULOUS! Why can't they deliver a quality product with quality customer service??? I would be happy with semi-quality for the price but HOW CAN I SUPPORT THIS COMPANY WHEN I SEND THE PRODUCT BACK TO BE REPAIRED AND IT COMES BACK WITH ANOTHER PROBLEM AND IS STILL UNWATCHABLE? That is not quality not even poor quality it is JUNK! SHAME ON YOU SCEPTRE. HAVE SOME STANDARDS!Still trying to get a hold of Sceptre Customer service or live chat online. According to their hours on their voice mail and on their website, they have been "open" for 50 minutes. Live chat says offline. When I phone customer service I just get voice mail.I got through! The rep was very helpful...exceeded my expectations. They are emailing me a mailing label and I will send it back for service today.I finally have my tv back and it's workign the way it should! I have owned it for 6 months it died at 4 and it took nearly 2 months to be repaired, since they sent it back with a problem. With all that said...if it last 2 or more years I will be happy.

Reviews.Title: Short life
Reviews.Author: dgnoid
Reviews.Content: Watch the reviews on this TV. I bought 2 of them in 2012 and both are dead already. Same story as others. On screen Logo turns pink (was red), then fades away to an all black screen. Sound still works, but black screen. This soon progresses to a totally dead TV.Do not attempt to call for service. Go onto sceptre.com and fill out a service request. If TV is still under 1 year warranty, they will send you a shipping label and if you request it a box. Shipping through UPS store is free. The TV will be fixed and it takes about 3 weeks total to get it back.As long as you process your return online on their website, you will have no problems getting it fixed. And you better buy that extended warranty on this product.Good Luck

Reviews.Title: noce picture but the remote control sensor is junk
Reviews.Author: D. Bell
Reviews.Content: this TV has a great picture. However, the remote sensor is really bad. At first It hought it was the remote- I changed fresh batteries, and still had to sit up in bed, point the remote directly at TV and within a couple of feet to get it to work on any function except "power". Eventually, after about 1 month , it only worked for "power" , nothing else. I bought a universal remote, got it programmed, but it only works consistently for "power", nothing else. To change inputs I have to spend 45-60 seconds aiming the rmeote , and sometimes I just get up to change it manually. Unfortunately, though it was purchased in September,  it was a christmas gift so we didn't know about these issues until just recently. Too late to do anything.  Go for a better known brand.

Reviews.Title: Sceptre, Best Bang For Your $
Reviews.Author: Luke K.
Reviews.Content: Okay, I'm not gonna lie.  I do not one this particular model of Sceptre TV, but I do currently own a 24' 720/1080p Sceptre TV.  I bought it for $350 back in August of 2008, when Samsung, Sony, and Panasonic HDTV's of the same size were going for upwards of $450-500.  I bought it off of newegg.com and received it in the mail fairly quickly.  The only downside I've ever had with this TV was one stalled blue pixel right in the middle of the screen.  I noticed a few other reviewers comment on having the same issue, but it's nothing more than a minor annoyance.  I rarely notice it anymore.  I hardly expected to get 4 years out of this TV, but come this August it will have been 4 years.  I'm very pleased with this brand, having known nothing about them prior to buying from them back in 2008.  A great reliable brand, don't be scared by naysayers.
